tokens.resolved_gloss: above, over, upon, or against (yet always in this last relation with a downward aspect) in a great variety of applications
tokens.translation: above, over, upon, or against (yet always in this last relation with a downward aspect) in a great variety of applications

tokens.resolved_gloss: to strike with more or less violence (beat, fell, corrode); by implication (of attack) to knock together, i.e. surround or circulate
tokens.translation: to strike with more or less violence (beat, fell, corrode); by implication (of attack) to knock together, i.e. surround or circulate

tokens.resolved_gloss: a poisonous plant, probably the poppy (from its conspicuous head); generally poison (even of serpents)
